titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to address the protective custody of alien children accompanied by parents, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, Homeland Security, Ways and Means, Agriculture, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
